<<<<<<< HEAD
VVits miserie, and the vvorlds madnesse discouering the deuils incarnat of this age. Lodge, Thomas, 1558?-1625.
[8], 111, [1] p.
Printed by Adam Islip, and are to be sold by Cutbert Burby, at his shop by the Roiall-Exchange, London : 1596.
The author's name, Thomas Lodge, appears on A3r. Running title reads: Incarnate deuils. The first leaf is blank. Variant: t.p. reads "VVils". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
